Name: Waldorf Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of a walnut, apple wedge and chunk of blue cheese.
MUDDLE celery in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with a walnut, apple wedge and chunk of blue cheese.
Review: Walnut, celery and apple are essential elements to both a Waldorf Salad and this tasty Daiquiri.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Julian de Feral at Lutyens Bar in London, England.
